title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110eed
description: A classic novel of a lawyer who defends a black man accused of raping a white woman in the 1930s Alabama.

author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ece
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society where the government has complete control over its citizens.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ecf
description: The first novel in the Harry Potter series, following a young wizard's journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed0
description: A novel about the American dream and the excess of the 1920s, set on Long Island.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed1
description: A classic romance novel that explores themes of love, class, and social manners in early 19th-century England.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed2
description: A novel about teenage angst and alienation, narrated by the cynical Holden Caulfield.

title: The Hobbit
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed3
description: A fantasy novel about the quest of hobbit Bilbo Baggins to win a share of the treasure guarded by the dragon Smaug.

title: Fahrenheit 451
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed4
description: A dystopian novel about a future American society where books are banned and 'firemen' burn any that are found.

title: Jane Eyre
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed5
description: A novel following the experiences of its titular heroine, including her growth to adulthood and her love for Mr. Rochester.

title: Animal Farm
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ece
description: An allegorical novella reflecting events leading up to the Russian Revolution and then on into the Stalinist era of the Soviet Union.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed3
description: The first volume of The Lord of the Rings, following the quest to destroy the One Ring.

title: Moby Dick
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed6
description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to seek revenge on Moby Dick, the giant white sperm whale.

title: The Alchemist
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ef7
description: A novel that follows the journey of an Andalusian shepherd boy named Santiago.

title: Crime and Punishment
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed8
description: A novel about the mental anguish and moral dilemmas of Rodion Raskolnikov, an impoverished ex-student in St. Petersburg.

title: The Little Prince
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ed9
description: A poetic tale, with watercolor illustrations by the author, in which a pilot stranded in the desert meets a young prince.

title: Brave New World
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110eda
description: A dystopian novel set in a futuristic World State, where citizens are engineered into an intelligence-based social hierarchy.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110edb
description: The multi-generational story of the Buendía family, whose patriarch, José Arcadio Buendía, founded the fictional town of Macondo.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110edc
description: A mystery thriller novel that follows symbologist Robert Langdon and cryptologist Sophie Neveu.

title: The Kite Runner
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110edd
description: A story of friendship between a wealthy boy and the son of his father's servant, set in Afghanistan.

title: Frankenstein
author: 69388a4667e16d73e9110ede
description: A novel about a young scientist, Victor Frankenstein, who creates a sapient creature in an unorthodox scientific experiment.
